Text: Yepp, this one works great without disconnecting to the Internet, thank's for the adjustment, works great
Is it possible to make a portable vers of the new Diskeeper 2009? I have the 2008 vers but its a lot of improvements on the 2009 vers ???

@jersson
I've fighted a little with Diskeeper 2k9, but it seems that it's not possible to make it portable, at least not without some struggling I suppose. Even using Thinstall/Thinapp the resulting prog tries to install something else when runned, so it doesn't look so good to me.
Ok man thank's for the answer and I wonder how this guy made the 2008 vers precracked and it still works: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4304233/disckeeper_2008_full_cracked

@jersson
He picked up the files of a cracked install and packed it to copy the needed files in their place, adding also the relative Registry values. If you look, the file is a RAR SFX, and you can open it with WinRAR and see what it does. This can probably be done also with the 2009 version, even if programmers add always something new to their versions to avoid crackers having an easy life... ;-)
Do you have an anti virus spyware program that detects and removes Bohmini.A?
Not good. Registers OK but seconds after running it tells you it's a pirated copy and then shuts down. LOL

@dhalgren57
Here it works fine even if you let it connect to internet. Maybe you have some leftovers of a previous version on your system...
Thanks for the UP! Works like a charm on my Windows XP box.

Everyone watch out for the keygen.exe file. It is a Trojan VIRUS! Luckily my spyware software caught it before any damage occured. The other files are harmless though. Just uncheck the keygen.exe file and the rest is OK.
